text:
Hello all!
I created a multi-step survey in HubSpot for my company <https://www.ziflow.com/the-state-of-creative-workflow-survey>
But it is getting spammed by some random contacts.
My question is - is something more than captcha and blocking free email providers possible to prevent from that?
Unfortunately, email field in this very form is optional, so spammers can omit that just by not typing anything in that field.
Maybe some IP blocking or limiting form being sent only once per session? :thinkonk:
